data.text: Me ba, mma wo werɛ mfiri me nkyerɛkyerɛ,
na ɛbɛma wo nkwa aware, mfeɛ bebree
Mma adɔeɛ ne nokorɛ mfiri wo nkyɛn
Na wobɛnya adom ne din pa
Fa wʼakoma nyinaa to Awurade so
hunu no wʼakwan nyinaa mu,
Nnye wo ho nni sɛ woyɛ onyansafoɔ
Ɛde ahoɔden bɛbrɛ wo onipadua
Fa wʼahonya hyɛ Awurade animuonyam,
na ɛno na ɛbɛma wo pata ayɛ ma abu so,
Me ba, sɛ Awurade tene wo so a, tie no yie,
Ɛfiri sɛ, obiara a Awurade pɛ nʼasɛm no, ɔtwe nʼaso,
Nhyira nka onipa a ɔhunu nyansa,
ɛfiri sɛ, nimdeɛ ho mfasoɔ sene dwetɛ,
Ne boɔ yɛ dene sene bota;
Nkwa tenten wɔ ne nsa nifa mu;
Nʼakwan yɛ ahomeka,
Ɔyɛ nkwa dua ma wɔn a wɔsɔ ne mu;
Nyansa mu na Awurade yɛɛ asase fapem,
Ɛfiri ne nimdeɛ mu na ɔkyekyɛɛ ebunu mu,
Me ba, fa atemmuo pa ne nhunumu sie,
ɛbɛyɛ nkwa ama wo,
Afei wo kwan so bɛyɛ wo dwoodwoo,
sɛ woda a worensuro;
Nsuro mpofirim amanehunu
Ɛfiri sɛ, Awurade bɛyɛ wʼawerɛhyɛm
Mfa ade pa nkame wɔn a wɔfata,
Nka nkyerɛ wo yɔnko sɛ:
Mpam ɔhaw mma wo yɔnko
Mfa ɛso nto obi so kwa
Mma wʼani mmere basabasayɛfoɔ,
ɛfiri sɛ Awurade kyiri basabasayɛfoɔ
Awurade nnome wɔ omumuyɛfoɔ efie so,
Ɔdi fɛdifoɔ a wɔyɛ ahantan ho fɛ
Anyansafoɔ bɛnya animuonyam adi,
